name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Hurley McDANIELS, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Hurley McDANIELS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Catherine Marshall, Philadelphia, for Com., appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
715 A.2d 429
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Hurley McDANIELS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 14, 1997.
Decided Aug. 19, 1998.
Lee Mandell, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Catherine Marshall, Philadelphia, for Com., appellee.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
